original_title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: Viva Las Pegasus
overview: When Rainbow Dash's pranking spree gets out of hand, Pinkie Pie and the other ponies of Ponyville teach her an important lesson in not taking your pranks too far... And whilst the popular Las Pegasus report, run by a generous pony named Gladmane, appears to be a paradise, Applejack and Fluttershy quickly realise that all is not as it appears!
title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: Viva Las Pegasus
